thread.title: BRIEF-Nokia secures all required approvals for Alcatel-Lucent deal
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Nokia secures all required approvals for Alcatel-Lucent deal | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Nokia secures all required approvals for Alcatel-Lucent deal
text:
Oct 21 Nokia Oyj
* announces receipt of all required regulatory approvals to proceed with the filing of its public exchange offer for Alcatel-Lucent
* says this follows the decision by the French Ministry of Economy (MINEFI) to approve the proposed transaction today
* says initial exchange offer settlement date is expected to be in the first quarter of 2016 Further company coverage: (Helsinki Newsroom)
